Delicious, to-die-for quiche. Excellent carrot cake. Four stars because the service is, like most locally-owned restaurants, contingent on who happens to be working while you're there. My most recent experience was the one that gave me bad vibes.There was only one other customer I handed a €20 bill for a cappuccino & a quiche (€7,20) and was given €2,70 (three €,20 cent coins & one €,10, which can easily be mistake as the proper change i was owed of €,80, but I intuitively question her honesty based on weird vibes). When I asked for the remainder of my change, she looked disappointed but returned to the cash register, and gave me a €10 bill. But, the quiche was probably worth €20 anyway, so... I'm obviously going back.
